entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
